projects.title: Human Resources Management
projects.description: This is a full-fledged e-commerce platform for clothing and footwear, built using React.js for the frontend and JSON Server to simulate a backend database for user management. The platform allows users to register, log in. Users can browse a wide selection of products, including clothing and footwear, each with detailed information such as name, price, and description. Additionally, the platform features a shopping cart where users can easily add items, modify quantities, or remove products, and proceed with a smooth and secure checkout process to complete their purchases. The platform also offers detailed store information, enabling users to browse various product categories, including apparel and shoes, for an interactive and seamless shopping experience.

projects.title: Clothing And Shoe Store
projects.description: This is an employee management system designed to streamline the process of managing employee data within a company. The frontend is built using React.js for a dynamic and responsive user interface, while the backend is powered by JSON Server, simulating a real-time database. The application features a table that displays a comprehensive list of employees, including details such as name, gender, date of birth, address, password, and password confirmation. Users can easily add new employees, edit existing information, and delete records when necessary. This system provides a simple and efficient solution for managing employee data, ensuring smooth and effective handling of employee records within an organization.

projects.title: Hospital Medicine Inventory Management
projects.description: In the Hospital Medicine Inventory Management project, I developed the frontend interface using Material UI and ReactJS, while the backend was built with JSON Server. The website allows users to view a list of medicines available in the inventory, displaying details such as the medicine name, entry date, expiration date, and quantity in stock. Additionally, the system enables users to add new medicines, update medicine details, and delete existing medicines. It also provides functionality for generating a medicine purchase invoice and exporting the invoice to Excel. This project aimed to streamline the process of managing hospital inventory and ensure accurate tracking of medicines while facilitating easy invoice creation for transactions.

projects.title: e-Invoice
projects.description: I worked on an electronic invoicing project, where my primary role involved fixing interface issues using Webix and addressing logic errors through JavaScript. My responsibilities included improving the user interface to ensure a seamless and user-friendly experience, as well as debugging and troubleshooting existing code to optimize performance. I collaborated closely with the team to identify bugs and implement solutions, ensuring the accuracy and efficiency of the invoicing process. Additionally, I worked on enhancing the responsiveness and functionality of the web application, making sure it met both business requirements and user expectations. My work contributed to the smooth operation and overall success of the project, resulting in a more reliable and efficient electronic invoicing system
